frequentlyQuestions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
frequentlyQuestions.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services

questions.question: What is the average development time?
questions.answer: The timeline varies according to project complexity, typically between 4-12 weeks.

questions.question: How does the development process work?
questions.answer: We work in stages: briefing, planning, design, development, testing, and launch.

questions.question: Do you offer post-launch support?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance plans and continuous support after launch.
